alt

setSizeFromGif

public Image setSizeFromGif(java.lang.String dirname,
                            java.lang.String pathname)
Set the image size from the header of a GIF file.

Parameters:
dirname - The directory name, expected to be in OS format
pathname - The image path name relative to the directory. Expected to be in WWW format (i.e. with slashes) and will be converted to OS format.

Set the image size from the header of a GIF file.
